snippet: The announcement follows several major victories for the group in recent years, including the legalization of same-sex marriage in New York in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The announcement follows several major victories for the group in recent years, including the legalization of same-sex marriage in New York in 2011.

headline.main: Empire State Pride Agenda to Disband, Citing Fulfillment of Its Mission
headline.print_headline: Leading Group On Gay Rights To Shut Down
